channel.title: AWS CLI on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in AWS CLI on Analyst

item.title: AWS Logs
item.description: This document is devoted to AWS logs. Several examples are analysed and useful fields are marked.

item.title: ⛅️ AWS Evidence Collection
item.description: Are there any Shadow Cloud Accounts? Could be the first place to look when investigating.

item.title: AWS Configuration
item.description: Default Configurations By default, SSH 22 and RDP 3389 are closed, but these are suggested to be opened when creaing them, warning how dangeroud this is.
